title: Cash App had a security breach last year that affected some U.S. customers
content:
Cash App is one of the most popular services for sending money over the internet, especially in the United States. It’s developed by Block, Inc, the same company behind the Square payments platform, and a new regulatory document published by Block reveals it had a security breach last year. Block, Inc submitted a Form 8-K

The post Cash App had a security breach last year that affected some U.S. customers appeared first on xda-developers.
